== Release Meeting Items ==
=== RC Bugs ===
* none atm.

=== Team Summaries ===
Please add a team summary here weekly to report on progress.
==== Foundations ====
===== Activity =====
* work begun on patching base packages to be cross-compilable under xdeb
* merged Linaro ARM git tree is now published on git.linaro.org; will need to begin work on per-flavor packaging branches soon
* initial downloadable cross-compiler packages available at <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~hrw/ubuntu-maverick-armel-cross-compilers/]]</nowiki>

==== Infrastructure ====
===== Activity =====
* Work progresses on automated testing framework and validation dashboard.  Anticipate the work items and blueprints to be finalized and approved soon.  Some work has started.
* Still a great deal of debate on how to implement derived archives and rebuilds of derived archive.  Launchpad team has expressed reservations with our approach.  Salgado put forth a proposal on how to build Vostok using Launchpad for debate.  Discussion around using Soyuz as a library. Kiko to produce a detailed vision for how Vostok to work; decisions deferred to after next weeks call.
* Call regarding open sourcing !LexBuilder for image building services.  Work deferred here for two weeks to see what happens.  Fall back plans are to produce process documentation for image building, using live-helper and modifying live-helper for ARM bootloaders.

==== User Platforms ====
===== Activity =====
* finished milestone planning
* work on arm-graphics-on-x stack; clutter and mutter stacks ported in ppa; next: clutk + unity
* work on qt-on-embedded: discussed soname changes with upstream; prepared first qws packages in ppa.
* investigating available modem options for phone calls (still ongoing)
